name: Lympo
introduce: Lympo is a sports NFTs ecosystem including NFTs with IP rights of world-famous athletes and clubs. Lympo is building a GameFi product ecosystem based on the officially licensed athlete’s NFTs. Lympo's first game is a basketball manager game, including a dedicated generative art NFT collection of fantasy and real basketball players as well as the possibility to utilize other Lympo NFTs to upgrade the gameplay. Lympo was originally established as a fitness app track users fitness activities.
